entry.title: Fu Manchu - Robotic Invasion
entry.summary:
Posted on October 30, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Classic band, USA, New song

New song from the great Fu Manchu ! Enjoy.

entry.title: Noctum - Liberty In Death
entry.summary:
Posted on October 29, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Doom, Hard Rock, Sweden, Ghost

Not purely stoner, more on the doom side, blended with hard rock and a slight touch of psychedelic. Those guys reminds me a lot of Ghost, in less theatrical. And I ADORE Ghost.

entry.title: BongJovi - I Hate The Sun
entry.summary:
Posted on October 29, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Alternative, Punk, USA

I just HAD to share this band. Funny name, cool lyrics, riffing is nice and catchy. I’m just not a big fan of the screamed voice, but that’s okay. I still like it.

entry.title: Barbarian Fist - No Brakes On The Rape Train
entry.summary:
Posted on October 29, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Norway, Desert Rock, Psychedelic, Stoner Doom

Psychedelic stoner doom from Norway, which will arouse you and make you grow a beard. I hear a lot of Kyuss in the sound of that.
Dat cover tho !

entry.title: Steak - Liquid Gold
entry.summary:
Posted on October 22, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, UK, Psychedelic, Heavy

A not really known band from the UK, groovy, heavy and psychedelic. Also, it makes me hungry.

entry.title: Fuzz - Fuzz
entry.summary:
Posted on October 22, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Fuzz, Stoner, USA, Full Album

Big psychedelic dragon, fuzzy sound and ethereal voice ? Yup, I like that !

entry.title: Eight bells - The Captain's Daughter
entry.summary:
Posted on October 14, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: progressive, dark, ambient, avant garde, psychedelic

So this one isn’t stoner per se, but it’s heavily psychedelic and awesome. From the ashes of a progressive rock, this band blends black metal, progressive rock and long psychedelic jam. That’s great.

entry.title: Cult of Luna - In Awe Of
entry.summary:
Posted on October 14, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: post-hardcore, sludge, atmospheric, Sweden

I’m from being a fan of Cult Of Luna, or the post-hardcore movement in general. But I like this song. From the new albm of the band, Vertikal. A mechanical, desperate scifi feels.

entry.title: Cathedral - The Devil´s Summit
entry.summary:
Posted on October 13, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Doom, USA, Saxophone, Jam

The famous band Cathedral. Everybody knows them. But this song is very special. It’s way more “happy” and has a great saxophone on it. Enjoy.

entry.title: Om - Rays Of The Sun/To The Shrinebuilder
entry.summary:
Posted on October 12, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: stoner doom, USA, psychedelic

After Sleep disbanded, the remaining members went to form this two piece band. Hypnotic, transcendental, awesome.
